name: open Pharmacy Management System
short_description:
The modern hospital requires a robust and reliable clinical pharmacy hospital. The community is waiting a software that offers more functionalities than  track medicine inventory, dispense medicines to patients, and record and analyze patient medical records, including their medicine regimens.

The openPMS has the clinical pharmacy workflow along with easier the stock management, what decreases the shortage of medical supply stocks. With this new system, the user will be able to quantify, analyze, and report relevant data, that must be exchanged between it and existing applications, and the required functionality.
summary: The openPMS is a robust and reliable sw for hospital clinical pharmacy
